com.stripe.android.view.i18n

Interface ErrorMessageTranslator


  • public ErrorMessageTranslator

    • Constructor Detail

      • ErrorMessageTranslator

        public ErrorMessageTranslator()

    • Method Detail

      • translate

        @NotNull
java.lang.String translate(int httpCode,
                                    @Nullable
                                    java.lang.String errorMessage,
                                    @Nullable
                                    StripeError stripeError)

        See Stripe API Errors for a list of error codes and associated messages.

        Parameters:
        httpCode - The HTTP code associated with the error response.
        errorMessage - A human-readable message providing more details about the error.For card errors, these messages can be shown to your users.
        stripeError - The class StripeError that represents detailed information about theerror. Specifically, StripeError.code is useful for understandingthe underlying error (e.g. "payment_method_unactivated").
        Returns:
        a non-null error message
        See Also:
        Stripe API Errors
